description:
Conversion of garage to habitable room,
Alterations to garage roof to raise height, Replacement garage door, Single
storey side to rear extension, Alterations and extensions to side dormers, Rear
patio, Replacement retaining wall,  External alterations
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials and bond to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
